A Wildcat’s guide to sexual health

By Rita Liu

College comes with a whole slew of new things to worry about: classes, tough professors, midterms, the whole shebang. However, something that people often forget to worry about is sexual health. Since a lot of students have been with the same family doctor for most of their childhoods, the idea of seeking out a new doctor in the Evanston area may seem kind of daunting. However, there are many options for those who are looking.

Click a location on the map to learn more!
